name: Pangaea
description:
Pangaea is a game about fitting together terrain to form a landmass that is as big as possible. While you start out small, you must join tiles together strategically to grow as large as you can.

WASD to move. QE to rotate

Mouse over tiles to see tooltips

Space to show tile status

"End" key to toggle the UI on or off

Created in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021.
